comment.author: 42536354@N00
comment._content: This is a photograph of "Rue des Francs-Bourgeois" (not "Frances") and it was NOT taken by a Canon EOS 20D! Otherwise, it's a great photograph - I love the turret, I've seen it up close many times. Seen in your Atget set. (?)

comment.author: 40528753@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/designwallah] I think they just used the 20D as a scanner to convert this printed photograph into a digital image.

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: Yes, thank you for the correction to the title.

comment.author: 76277389@N00
comment._content: This is looking south on Rue Pavée towards the triangle at Rue Malher. Most of those buildings still stand today.
